array.string: Push-ups
1. Start in plank position 2. Bend arms to 90 degrees while remaining in plank position 3. Press arms back to straight
Tricep Push-ups

1. Start in plank position, hands directly under shoulders 2. Bend arms to 90 degrees while keeping elbows pinned to ribs, shoulders should come forward so that forearms are perpendicular to the floor 3. Press arms back to straight
Bentover Flys

1. With a small bend in the knees, sit hips back and lean forward so that shoulders are aligned with knees 2. Move arms straight out to a T 3. Lift arms up and backwards so that muscles in upper back engage 4. Release arms back to T shape
Side Arm Raises
1. Move arms to make a T shape parallel to the ground 2. Move arms slightly up and down in a pulsating motion
Front Arm Raises
1. Move arms to be parallel with the ground out in front 2. Move arms slightly up and down in pulsating motion
Decline Push-ups
1. Find a raised surface 2. Put feet on raised surface and move to a plank position 3. Bend arms to 90 degrees while maintaining plank position 4. Press arms back to straight
Incline Push-ups
1. Find raised surface 2. Put hands on raised surface and move to a plank position 3. Bend arms to 90 degrees while maintaining plank position 4. Press arms back to straight
Mountain Climbers
1. Move to plank position 2. Draw one leg in towards chest while maintaining plank form 3. Return to plank position 4. Repeat with other leg
Cross Body Mountain Climbers
1. Move to plank position 2. Draw one leg in towards opposite elbow while maintaining plank form 3. Return to plank position 4. Repeat with other leg
Down Dog Push-ups
1. Move to downward dog position 2. Bend elbows so that forearms lower and hover above ground 3. Press back to straight arms
Vinyassa Push-ups
1. Move to downward dog position 2. Bend elbows keeping them tight to body 3. Pause just above ground 4. Push to up-dog with straight arms
Handstand
1. Find wall if needed 2. Place hands on floor 3. Kick up to transfer weight onto hands
